LOGIN.escribirmail: Enter your email address and we´ll send you instructions to reset your password.

INDEX.xfafoto: Please upload a picture of your identification card to identify yourself.
INDEX.paso0: Steps to make your APP Check in
INDEX.paso1: 1- Please fill in your details and those of your companions. Do not forget to upload the photo of your identification card to be able to advance.
INDEX.paso2: 2- Upload your reservation details to check in.
INDEX.paso3: 3- Confirm the 4 levels of the APP check in to get tje Access code.
INDEX.paso4: 4- Present the QR in the reception, take the key and enjoy your stay!

CI.subtdatos: Check all details or modify it in 'My details'
CI.aceptodatos: I accept and confirm that the data sent corresponds to my reservation.
CI.subtrva: Click the reservation that you want to chek in or upload it first in 'My reservations'
CI.subtterm: Please read and accept our Terms an Conditions, safety manual and COVID-19  DDJJ
CI.aceptoterm: I accept our Terms an Conditions, safety manual and COVID-19  DDJJ
CI.subttc: The credit card details are only as a guarantee. We will not make any charge in it if you do not require it at the time of Check Out.
CI.excelente: Congratulation! Your check in is confirmed!
CI.loesperamos: We are waiting for you to make your stay very pleasant

CO.seleccione: Click the reservation to make the Check Out.
CO.opselec: Click one option and make the Check Out
CO.tcgtia: Use the Guarantee Credit Card to pay the total.
CO.otratc: Use another Credit Card to pay the total
CO.fac: The invoice will be sent to the informed mailbox.
